meanings.definition: Related to or characteristic of masturbation.
meanings.sent1: The onanistic behavior of the character in the story was clear to everyone.
meanings.sent2: He had an onanistic habit of spending hours alone in his room.
meanings.sent3: The onanistic squirrel spent hours grooming itself in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her onanistic focus on personal pleasure left little room for social interactions.
meanings.sent5: The onanistic nature of his actions was evident in his selfish choices.

meanings.sent1: The onanistic desire for constant praise made her difficult to work with.
meanings.sent2: His onanistic attitude towards success alienated his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The onanistic cat refused to share its toys with other pets.
meanings.sent4: Her onanistic approach to life focused solely on personal pleasure.
meanings.sent5: The onanistic pursuit of wealth led to his isolation from friends and family.
